    • destroy

      @Deprecated public void destroy()
      Deprecated.
      Destroys The Call Backs Created. Note: -Will Cause Crash If Called Right Before Calling glfwFreeCallbacks(Use destroySafe();).

    • destroySafe

      public void destroySafe()
      Safely destroys the callbacks created. This function is safe to use before calling glfwDestroyCallbacks.
      Specified by:
      destroySafe in class GLFWInput
